attributes.review: I’m absolutely disgusted by this app I wanted to support my wonderful business man I mean president but when I opened the app I saw tons of Mexican butts I thought you were gonna fix this problem I geuss I have to vote blue from now on I won’t stand for this mockery
attributes.title: Abhorrent app 💅✨🧚‍♂️

attributes.review: when i opened this app there was this terrible image of a orange fat mongoose that scared away my pet rat. it took HOURS to download. i am now scared to keep it on my iphone from other reviews. some said that they were hacked!!!💖👁👄👁🔫🔫🧿👄🧿🥵🥰😻👉👈🦋🦋🦋🕶🐬👁👅👁and if tik tok is taken down bc of the mongoose😾😾😾😾😾
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE

attributes.review: this app stole all my data off my phone. it accessed all my icloud as well. i never even put in my info or said that it was okay to access my info. after this happened i started getting calls from all over the world all day everyday. i had to buy a completely new phone and new number for it to stop because even when i got a new number it still didn’t stop.
attributes.title: worst experience of my life

attributes.review: I felt like this whole app was HORRIBLE. It took 3,000 years to download and it filled up my new iPhone 100 😤😤😤. All I wanted to do is support my orange sugar daddy😍😍, but this is unacceptable. I still want to your money in your pocket but fix this app because it is HORRIBLE😡😡😡
attributes.title: Disgusting bad

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app my whole screen went black and when I went to the apple store I had to end up getting a new phone, after two hours I found out I got hacked by the program
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.review: This app completely corrupted my phone. I was alerted that America would become a dictatorship and that all of our liberties would be removed. This app is full of hate speech and the dismissal of intellectual ideas and research. Can’t believe this thing exists!
attributes.title: Horrific

attributes.review: I expected to have an app to support my racist egotistical rapist of a president instead that’s exactly what I got! I’m beyond disgusted❤️He also told me to go back to my country😭 Maybe next time don’t take down our apps and we won’t take down yours 😘
attributes.title: HORRIFIC 💔😭

attributes.review: Immediately after waiting 3.2 years for this app to download, my parents informed me that they’re getting a divorce and it’s my fault. My dog also ran into oncoming traffic after watching me download this app. Thanks for killing my dog, Donald Trump.
attributes.title: This app ruined my life

attributes.review: the title says it all. it took all my data and wiped my phone of everything. contacts, pictures, texts, etc. now, i’m pregnant. and, i was told to delete the app i had to vote donald trump for 2020! i do NOT recommend this app. thanks!
attributes.title: hacked my phone

attributes.review: i am sorry but this app is just completely the worst there could be aside from the president itself of course. i hate this app, please delete it along with his face please!! he’s treating us like slaves, my people and my friends! i can’t tolerate this!! 😡😤💢
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!
